Interface CustomerManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerManagerImpl

    public interface CustomerManager

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCustomer(Customer customer)
      Insert new Customer into database.
      void deleteCustomer(Customer customer)
      Delete customer in database by id.
      java.util.List<Customer> findAllCustomers()
      Generate list of all customers in database.
      Customer findCustomerById(java.lang.Long id)
      Find customer in database by given id.

    • Method Detail

      • createCustomer

        void createCustomer(Customer customer)
                    throws ServiceFailureException
        Insert new Customer into database.
        Parameters:
        customer - customer to be created.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when customer is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when customer's name is empty string.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when customer's surname is empty string.
        ServiceFailureException - when database fails.

      • updateCustomer

        void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
                    throws ServiceFailureException
        Update Customer in database by id.
        Parameters:
        customer - customer to be updated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when customer is null, or customer.getId() is null.
        ServiceFailureException - when database fails.

      • deleteCustomer

        void deleteCustomer(Customer customer)
                    throws ServiceFailureException
        Delete customer in database by id.
        Parameters:
        customer - customer to be deleted.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when customer is null, or customer.getId() is null.
        ServiceFailureException - when database fails.

      • findAllCustomers

        java.util.List<Customer> findAllCustomers()
                                          throws ServiceFailureException
        Generate list of all customers in database.
        Returns:
        List of all customers in database.
        Throws:
        ServiceFailureException - when database fails.

      • findCustomerById

        Customer findCustomerById(java.lang.Long id)
                          throws ServiceFailureException
        Find customer in database by given id.
        Parameters:
        id - id of customer to be found.
        Returns:
        Found customer or null if customer with specified id is not in database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when given id is null.
        ServiceFailureException - when database fails.

      • findCustomerByName

        java.util.List<Customer> findCustomerByName(java.lang.String query)
                                            throws ServiceFailureException
        Find customers in database with specified name. Method find in both firstName and lastName.
        Parameters:
        query - name to be found. It can be firstName or lastName.
        Returns:
        list of customers with specified name.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when given name is null.
        ServiceFailureException - when database fails.
